welcome to the farmington police department

the farmington police department, led by chief scott orlando, strives to protect & serve its community in a manner consistent with the rights & dignity of all persons as provided for by law & under the constitutions of the united states & the state of new hampshire.





location:
160 main street
farmington, nh 03835
be sure to check if you use a mapping program.  we are located just opposite the golf course about 1/2 mile north of the route 11 and 153 intersection.
phone & fax:
office: (603) 755-2731
dispatch: (603) 755-2231
fax: (603) 755-9712
office hours:
mon-friday:  7:30 am to 3:30 pm  






mailing address:
160 main street
farmington, nh 03835
(get directions)

phone & fax:
office: (603) 755-2731
dispatch: (603) 755-2231
fax: (603) 755-9712
crimeline: (603) 755-9797

the front office is open monday through friday 7:30 am to 3:30 pm but our officers work 24/7. if you are calling after hours call the dispatch line and an officer will get back to you as soon as possible.

farmington recreation department
please don’t park at the farmington recreation department. it is posted and will be used for some upcoming events in march. also in the late spring it may reopen for activities. we do not want to tow your vehicle so please use the parking your landlord has provided for you. thank you.

vote 2020-november 3, 2020
voting will be at the high school, 40 thayer drive. the closest parking will be at the lot on the right side closest to the fields. there will be signs to assist you. if you need handicapped parking it will be in front where the busses line up. there will also be signs to assist […]

halloween
